bs-watchlist-desc: Adds a watchlist widget and tag
bs-watchlist-tag-watchlist-desc: Shows the articles which have most recent changes and are on your watchlist.
bs-watchlist-tag-watchlist-attr-count-he: Number of entries on watchlist should be shown
bs-watchlist-tag-watchlist-attr-maxtitle: Number of letters which should be shown of the title. Can be a number between 5 and 500.
bs-watchlist-tag-watchlist-attr-order-he: Shows list sorted by time or page name
bs-watchlist-tag-watchlist-no-user: Watchlist cannot be displayed because no user is logged in
bs-watchlist-tag-watchlist-no-entries: No changes on pages to show in watchlist
bs-watchlist-droplet-description: Latest changes to pages included in the watchlist
